Articles.Content:
For the life of me I cant get the flight path to have a entry to a planet, but I can intercept my orbit... I have a resonable ship to try to get to eve, but I don't know how, I mean I somewhat know how to do my burns. I don't even know how to tilt my orbit polar or anything, but I can get to minmus and mun no problemo. Any tutorials/videos?

Thanks

Edited September 24, 2012 by Aeroshell
Hi Aeroshell, there is a lot of info here that can help with orbits, for reaching the other planets, try changing Conic_Patch_Limit to 3 or 4 in settings.cfg, it'll help

I'm also creating a new set of tutorials and I'll be doing some orbital mechanics stuff tomorrow. Will probably do basic and well as advanced maneuvers and planet transfers if you care to wait. And there are many written tutorials around the forums, as vager has pointed out, that can also help. Some are a bit hard to understand though, so I know where you come from. I was totally lost when I started.

I'm also creating a new set of tutorials and I'll be doing some orbital mechanics stuff tomorrow. Will probably do basic and well as advanced maneuvers and planet transfers if you care to wait. And there are many written tutorials around the forums, as vager has pointed out, that can also help. Some are a bit hard to understand though, so I know where you come from. I was totally lost when I started.
Well I know how to get around and such, and to minmus and mun, ive had the game for a while, but i cant figure out planets. Link me when you make your vids

Follow Sal_Vager advice on the patched conics, and use this: www.ksp.olex.biz

EDIT: this works too http://www.kerbal.net/mod.php?id=36

Well I know how to get around and such, and to minmus and mun, ive had the game for a while, but i cant figure out planets. Link me when you make your vids

I'll make these advanced tutorials first thing tomorrow since a lot of people seem to be having trouble with them!
